Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Manchester in 1976...
Injured on 4/29/1976 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/18/1976 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 4/2/1978 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/13/1978 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/13/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/7/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1983, off Brandon Kelly (NJ)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1983...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1983, going 3-1, 0.93...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/1/1983 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1983, going 17-9, 3.04 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 8/11/1984, off Dwight Mahurin (Min)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1986, going 3-2, 1.35...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/2/1989 to a 6-year deal worth $10,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1989, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/2/1990 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1990, going 4-1, 0.92...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1990, going 5-0, 1.07...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1990, going 24-9, 1.77 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1991, going 4-0, 1.05...
Struck out 16 batters against Northeastern on 4/16/1992...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1992, going 4-2, 1.32...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/2/1992 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
